Others: The Los Angeles Clippers won their second preseason game against the Dallas Mavericks with a score of 110-96.
Klay Thompson went scoreless in the game, recording three rebounds and one assist.
Quentin Grimes had a team-high 20 points for the Mavericks.
The Clippers outscored the Mavericks 34-20 in the paint and had 10 players in the points column.
The Mavericks had 15 turnovers in the first half and struggled with their defense and shooting.
The Clippers will play their final preseason game against the Sacramento Kings, while the Mavericks host the Milwaukee Bucks in their final tune-up game.
